game.title: Minecraft
game.synopsis: A group of players must fight to survive against hordes of zombies in a post-apocalyptic world.
game.beginning: A group of players are dropped onto a map and must fight to survive against hordes of zombies in a post-apocalyptic world.
game.ending: The players must fight their way to the center of the map, where they will find a way to escape the zombies.
